result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Kevin W. Hayden

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Guy M. Taylor appearing on behalf of defendant. Kevin W. Hayden, defendant does not appear. Jeffrey Duane Kohl appearing as prosecuting attorney. State believes Defendant has moved to Colorado. Due to non-appearance, State is asking for a Bench Warrant. Court issues Bench Warrant.

Kevin W. Hayden, defendant appeared in Court by phone with counsel Guy M. Taylor in person.
Jeffrey Duane Kohl appeared as prosecuting attorney.

Guy M. Taylor appearing on behalf of defendant. Kevin W. Hayden, defendant does not appear. Jeffrey Duane Kohl appearing as prosecuting attorney. Due to non-appearance by the defendant, Mr Kohl motions to re-schedule.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for August 10, 2015 at 09:00 am.

Kevin W. Hayden, defendant appeared in Court in person with counsel Guy M. Taylor.
Jeffrey Duane Kohl appeared as prosecuting attorney.

Kevin W. Hayden, defendant appeared in Court in person without counsel. Victim, Rebecca L.M appeared in Court in person.
Jeffrey Duane Kohl appeared as prosecuting attorney. Court grants bond modification request.

Violation -  DC DV 2cts; Unlawful Phone Use-Threaten w/ Obscenity DV; Resist/Obstruct Officer.  Issuing Agency - GCSD.
May not possess or consume any intoxicants.    NO violent or abusive CONTACT WITH Rebecca L.M.  No contact with Studio 906.    May not enter establishments that sell intoxicants with the exception of gas stations and grocery stores.  May enter gas stations and grocery stores but may not go into the area where intoxicants are sold.

Violation -  DC DV 2cts; Unlawful Phone Use-Threaten w/ Obscenity DV; Resist/Obstruct Officer.  Issuing Agency - GCSD.    May not possess or consume any intoxicants.    NO CONTACT WITH Rebecca L.M. except 3rd party contact to arrange child visitation.  No contact with residence at W2940 Washington St, Juda WI or Studio 906.    May not enter establishments that sell intoxicants with the exception of gas stations and grocery stores.  May enter gas stations and grocery stores but may not go into the area where intoxicants are sold.

Kevin W. Hayden, defendant appeared in Court in custody by video with counsel Jane Ellen Bucher.
Jeffrey Duane Kohl appeared as prosecuting attorney.  Court advises defendant of rights. Defendant given complaint. Defendant waives reading of complaint. Court advises defendant of charges and penalties.    Defendant stands mute, Court enters not guilty plea on defendants behalf.
